title: 7.0 MSBUILD Benchmarking|Optimization
body:
# Background
Tracks 7.0 benchmarking needs.

## User Stories...
- [x] #7320
- [x] #7321

## Justification
- Customer impact - ensuring proper UXs in a variety of platforms & product permutations.
- Needle moving (perf) - an exercise to measure performance given a combination of platform variables, with opportunistic optimizations.
